profile_positions.description: During this period, I worked on the design and the development of a next generation planning software. I really enjoyed developing this module in C++ and applying many Design Patterns (Gang of Four).

profile_positions.description:
In this position I contributed to the development of routing algorithms within ORTEC standard products. Furthermore, I did various implementations of our solutions at our customers. I also developed customizations on ORTEC vehicle routing products for customers

I started as a junior in August 1997, became a medior in January 2000 and senior in January 2003.
